alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 9:14PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central and northern Door County through 1015 PM CDT... At 913 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Menominee to 8 miles west of Egg Harbor to 9 miles northwest of Sturgeon Bay. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Egg Harbor around 930 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Jacksonport, Ephraim and Newport State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
